Connect your identity to your eduID

1. Add
            your id number

To be able
            to use eduID you have to prove your identity. Add your national id number and verify it in real life.
Your eduID is ready to use

2. Verify your id number
Choose a method to verify that you have access to the added id number. If you are unable to use a method you need to try another.

by phone
Enter confirmation code here
The phone number registry is maintained by phone operators at their convenience and may not include all registered phone numbers.
Tip: The registry is updated by phone operators at their convenience and may not include all registered phone numbers
Add your mobile number to continue
Go to Settings to add your phone number. Do not forget to also confirm it! You can only use this option with a confirmed number!
Your number also needs to be confirmed
Go to Settings to confirm your number. You can only use this option with a confirmed number.
Check if your phone number is connected to your id number.
This check will be done in a registry updated by the phone operators. If they have not added your details, we won't be able to find you and you need to choose another way to verify your identity.
Your national id number has been successfully verified
with a digital ID-card
To use this option you will need to first create a digital ID-card in the Freja eID app.
Use Freja eID+ and pass a local authorised agent
Install the app
Create a Freja eID Plus account (awarded the ‘Svensk e-legitimation’ quality mark)
The app will generate a QR-code
Find a local authorised agent, show them a valid ID together with the QR-code and they will be able to verify your identity
Tip: Use the app to find your nearest agent
Freja eID is now ready to be used with your eduID
What is Freja eID?

SE-LEG
To use this option you need to visit a SE-LEG RA and show identification.
Confirm using SE-LEG
How to confirm your account using SE-LEG

Visit the nearest library on this list:
  • Mjölby: Burensköldsvägen 13
  • Motala: Repslagaregatan 1
  • Söderköping: Margaretagatan 19
  • Åtvidaberg: B-fabriksgränd 4
Bring your chosen form of ID and the QR code below and ask the librarian for a verification of your eduID account.
Within a couple of hours you account should be verified.
with Freja eID
To use this option you need to have the Freja eID app installed on your device.
Confirm using Freja eID
How to confirm your account using Freja eID
Install the Freja eID app on your mobile device.
Open the app and follow the instructions to reach Freja eID+ (Plus) status.
Bring your chosen form of ID to an authorized agent and ask them to scan the QR-code in the Freja eID app. There is a map function in the Freja eID app to help you locate your nearest agent.
Return here using your mobile phone and click the link at the bottom of the page. The app will open.
Approve that Freja eID sends your personal identity number to eduID. Done!
I need to install Freja eID
I have Freja eID installed
Not using your phone?
You need to switch to a mobile device (iOS or Android) with Freja eID installed before you will be able to confirm your account using Freja eID.

ORCID
ORCID iD distinguishes you from other researchers and allows linking of your research outputs and activities to your identity, regardless of the organisation you are working with.
Learn more about ORCID in eduID from our FAQ.
